actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-998.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 274 - 132 (Record Vote No: 468).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (S. 1200) to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to effectively control unauthorized immigration to the United States, and for other purposes, and against the consideration of such conference report.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the conference report on S. 1200 (immigration law revisions) and against its consideration.

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (S. 1200) to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to effectively control unauthorized immigration to the United States, and for other purposes, and against the consideration of such conference report.
